As an AI, I don't have personal preferences or the ability to see, so I don't have a favorite color. My existence is in the realm of code and data, not in the physical world where light and color are perceived.

However, I can appreciate the significance and symbolism of different colors. For instance, blue is often associated with knowledge, calmness, and technology, while green can represent growth and nature.
